
Leavitt
=======

Variable star fitting software.


Authors
-------

- **Kyle Matt** (Montana State Univerrsity)
- **David Nidever** (Montana State University)

  
Installation
------------

To install the latest version::

    pip install git+https://github.com/KyleLMatt/leavitt
